ComicInfo.Title: One Shot
ComicInfo.Series: Tales from Wonderland: Queen of Hearts vs. The Mad Hatter
ComicInfo.Summary: When the Queen of Hearts killed the Mad Hatterâ€™s one true love he swore vengeance against her and all her minions. Now, the time for his revenge has come. The hunt has begun and none will escape the wrath of the Mad Hatter. Featuring part 3 of the final bonus story featuring the rise and fall of Charles Dodgson. Charles has made a promise to his wife to end the sacrifices that have kept him alive for over a century. But when Charles discovers his son Drake has been abusing his nephew Johnny, he must choose between keeping Johnny safe or keeping his promise to his wife. The final chapter of the trilogy that reveals the tragic origin of Charles Dodgson is here!
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-15 21:20:12. [CVDB232971]
ComicInfo.Writer: Raven Gregory, Joe Brusha, Ralph Tedesco
ComicInfo.Penciller: Ian Snyder, Martin Montiel, Martin Montiel Luna, Martin Montiel Luna
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Eric Basaldua, Nei Ruffino, Steven Cummings, Tony Shasteen
ComicInfo.Characters: Alice Liddle, Calie Liddle, Charles Dodgson, Cheshire Cat, Drake Liddle, Jabberwocky, Jack the Ripper, King of Hearts, Lewis Liddle, Queen of Hearts, Red Queen, Tweedle Dee and Tweedle Dum, White Rabbit
